name: Port Virellon
description: A rough but busy port ferrying commoners to the great city of Thalendir.

name: Virellon Boardwalk
description: A wooden walkway along the docks, bustling with vendors and fishermen.

name: The Salty Hound
description: A dockside tavern with creaky floors, strong ale, and stronger rumors.

name: Rusttooth Raider Camp
description: A cluster of tables, bones, and fire filled to the absolute brim with goblins and hobgoblins. To the South-West of Port Virellon.

name: Virellon Main Road
description: The central lane through Port Virellon, from the residental district to the docks.

name: The Gilded Mortar
description: A prestigious apothecary known for its rare ingredients and skilled alchemists.
